content: I've been trying to use Whova on my mac all day and the audio quality on the zoom sessions is truly terrible. I have rebooted several times and tried both wired (at 450 mbps) and wireless, to no avail. This has never happened in regular zoom meetings using Chrome. Any ideas? Whova support has been unresponsive
I'll also note that it's irritating to pay this much for a virtual conference where audio isn't working and I can't get support!
If you want to try connecting directly to zoom, it is possible to look at the source for a whova page and extract the meeting ID from it.
I have needed to do this as well to get it to work properly.

Jan Oldenburg said:

I have rebooted several times and tried both wired (at 450 mbps) and wireless, to no avail. This has never happened in regular zoom meetings using Chrome. Any ideas? Whova support has been unresponsive

Hi Jan -
I am so sorry you are experiencing issues with your mac. Please let us know which sessions you are trying to enter and we will make sure you can fully participate.

@Bryn Evans @Mary Ann Boyle
Hello Jan. Yes, please let me know what sessions you are trying to attend and @Bryn Evans and I can help you.
